title: FS2004 Aircraft Package 2009
description:
----------------------------------- INFORMATION -----------------------------------

Hours and hours of searching and downloading and now it's ready for sharing...

Probably the most comprehensive MS Flight Simulator 2004 add-on aircraft pack ever.

Yes... They're freeware, but my idea was to put them all into a one ISO-file so you don't have to bother searching and downloading them one by one and spend ages in certain freeware add-on sites.

So... Why's the ISO-file? Simply because it would took ages to ZIP them all together. I found that making an ISO-file was the most convenient way for me and probably for the downloaders too. Just mount the image and you're good to go and explore this massive collection. :)

In this collection there's 658 different aircrafts from 207 different manufacturers.
Civil jets, Military aircraft, Propellers etc. from various era's of aviation history.

Hope that you'll find this upload worth of downloading and interesting...

-------------------------------------- NOTICE ------------------------------------

I'm not able to seed this 24/7, but I'll seed it as often and as long as I can at the time. Please, have a bit of patience... :)
